## Summary

Data Carpentry is continually developing our Assesment efforts. On July 25th, 2017, [Paula Andrea](https://twitter.com/orchid00) joined [Kari L. Jordan](https://twitter.com/drkariljordan) to work on producing visualizations of the archived pre- and post-workshop survey data.
